Class HomeController3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.viewcontroller.HomeController3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class HomeController3D
extends Object
implements Controller
    A MVC controller for the home 3D view.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret

      • moveCamera

        public void moveCamera(float delta)
        Moves home camera of delta.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value in cm that the camera should move forward (with a negative delta) or backward (with a positive delta)

      • moveCameraSideways

        public void moveCameraSideways(float delta)
        Moves home camera sideways of delta.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value in cm that the camera should move left (with a negative delta) or right (with a positive delta)
        Since:
        4.4

      • elevateCamera

        public void elevateCamera(float delta)
        Elevates home camera of delta.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value in cm that the camera should move down (with a negative delta) or up (with a positive delta)

      • rotateCameraYaw

        public void rotateCameraYaw(float delta)
        Rotates home camera yaw angle of delta radians.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value in rad that the camera should turn around yaw axis

      • rotateCameraPitch

        public void rotateCameraPitch(float delta)
        Rotates home camera pitch angle of delta radians.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value in rad that the camera should turn around pitch axis
